channel.title: Help with a loading issue
channel.description:
Hello, I appreciate you took the time to look at my issue. The problem I'm having is that in my endeavors to get world objects to load through the client I have not been successful.
The reason I was attempting this is because I did not like how objects added server side such as trees, ore deposits, doors, and furnaces took longer to load than usual when someone teleported to/logged in near them.
What I had before was that I had tried to adapt the addGlobalObject code to be run client side, and that wasn't working, so I came here to see if anyone could guide me in the right direction or even help me come up with a solution to the objects loading slowly.
I appreciate your time, thank you!

item.title: Help with a loading issue
item.dc:creator: @shaden shaden
item.description:
@shaden wrote:

Hello, I appreciate you took the time to look at my issue. The problem I’m having is that in my endeavors to get world objects to load through the client I have not been successful.

The reason I was attempting this is because I did not like how objects added server side such as trees, ore deposits, doors, and furnaces took longer to load than usual when someone teleported to/logged in near them.

What I had before was that I had tried to adapt the addGlobalObject code to be run client side, and that wasn’t working, so I came here to see if anyone could guide me in the right direction or even help me come up with a solution to the objects loading slowly.

I appreciate your time, thank you!
